title: Add contact number to restaurant information

requirements.text: Update the ReservationInfo component to display the contact number +918638918243 alongside the existing contact information
acceptanceCriteria: The contact number +918638918243 is visible in the reservation/contact section
The phone number formatting is consistent with the existing design style
The contact information remains easily readable and accessible

constraints: Do not modify the backend schema or main actor
Preserve the existing moonlit elegance visual theme and color palette
Maintain the existing layout structure of the ReservationInfo component
